title: trueherobtc
author: trueherobtc
content: What do you guys think about Gala?

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: Quote from: trueherobtc on July 27, 2022, 11:23:55 PMWhat do you guys think about Gala? The project was good for long term but this project didn't meet crypto user's expectation caused by it has not offered play to earn mechanism. We have not seen the project like steam based on the crypto but gala was taking such idea to be the first gaming hub in the blockchain. The only problem is if crypto ecosystem was not the same like steam. It needs a hard work to make the crypto game developers wanna use gala market as a partnership to promote their game.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: I just find this token as good for holding if you don't have that much to do with it. Like if you're someone who's looking to scatter your money and investments then this is the type that I've included in my portfolio.I don't have much holding this token but if I have some spare money, I'd definitely add more from my stash.Currently, holding a few of it not because of FOMO but I think that I like how it's going so, whether I win or get loss from this token, it won't matter that much to me.

I guess the bear market is really taking a toll to everyone, even as high as what is being projected with GALA. I mean the hype around it, touted to disrupt the gaming industry, and the developer by the co founder of Zynga, so what could go wrong with this project?So maybe P2E niche is dying, Axie for one, the prime mover, has suffered big already. And now others is following that path. And if you believed in this project, then there is nothing wrong with investing on them right now as the price is very cheap.

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: Good token but didn't meant if this has so many utilities compared with another token in the market. Gala has become the main bet for some people. The fact that if this is almost copying the idea from steam. The hype around the blockchain game has gone. This token is not getting a lot of attention at this moment. Probably a good bet for long term if you didn't even care with the game. People called this as the next steam on the blockchain. This is not the same like anyother p2e game in the market.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: trueherobtc on July 27, 2022, 11:23:55 PMWhat do you guys think about Gala? In my opinion, Gala is a very good project, while other game blockchain projects are busy developing their own games, Gala is actually developing a platform/ecosystem for blockchain-based games.Since the first time the $GALA token launched, it has made ATH at a price of $0.83 or around 7000% ROI. Also don't forget that the founder of this Gala is Eric Schiermeyer, he is one of the founders of Zynga (if you play Facebook games, you must know about this developer).Overall, I think that Gala is a very potential project for long-term investment.
